title: MECL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 10 Executive Trainee Posts
description: The Mineral Exploration & Consultancy Limited (MECL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 10 Executive Trainee Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech and M.Sc. can apply for the MECL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process...
